analysis.description:
SynTokenCrowdsale.validPurchase (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#234-245) is declared view but changes state variables:
	- SynTokenCrowdsale.crowdsaleLive
	- SynTokenCrowdsale.tokensSold

Reentrancy in SynTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#214-232):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validPurchase()) (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#217-219)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensSold (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#228)

Reentrancy in SynTokenCrowdsale.forwardRemaining (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#247-262):
	External calls:
	- token.mint(tokenWallet,remaining) (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#257-258)
	- token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#258-262)
	State variables written after the call(s):

SynTokenCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#214-232) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#230)

SynTokenCrowdsale.forwardRemaining (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#247-262) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(tokenWallet,remaining) (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#257-258)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/25/0x71a311e90d2cf8b7d80d95e4bdf03da037653605.sol#258-262)
